articles.author: Ben Golliver
articles.title: Pacers’ Tyrese Haliburton stuns Thunder in last second to open NBA Finals - The Washington Post
articles.description: Indiana’s postseason of improbable comebacks continues with an 111-110 win. Haliburton’s jumper gave the visitors their only lead of the night, but the one that mattered most.
articles.content: OKLAHOMA CITY Tyrese Haliburton raced up the court, took a moment to survey the crowded landscape in front of him and calmly gave the Indiana Pacers their first lead Thursday night with a last-second… [+6473 chars]
